articles.title: Every Toyota Driver Should Understand These Two Safety Features
articles.description: Toyota's Safety Sense technology continues receiving essential updates. Two safety features are important: Lane Departure Alert and Lane Trace Assist.
articles.content: In 2016, Toyota launched its Safety Sense technology, which has steadily been updated to its current 3.0 version. It now includes two essential systems: Lane Departure Alert and Lane Trace Assist. Both systems use a front-facing camera and radar to i... [3458 chars]

articles.title: Consultancy top 4 earnings pass billion-$ mark in FY24, quartet expanding at 15-16% on average
articles.description: India's top four strategy consulting firms—McKinsey, BCG, Bain, and AT Kearney—achieved a historic milestone, crossing $1 billion in combined revenues in FY24. This rapid growth, averaging 15-16%, outpaces global trends and is driven by evolving client demands and technology transformation, with revenues projected to reach over $3 billion in less than a decade.
articles.content:
Synopsis
India's top four strategy consulting firms—McKinsey, BCG, Bain, and AT Kearney—achieved a historic milestone, crossing $1 billion in combined revenues in FY24. This rapid growth, averaging 15-16%, outpaces global trends and is driven by evol... [8262 chars]

articles.title: The Rise Of Reverse Automation: What It Means For The Future Of Work
articles.description: Reverse automation describes how technology is creating new human-centered jobs in the spaces where machines fall short, reshaping education, leadership, and opportunity.
articles.content: When people think about automation, the focus is almost always on what it takes away. They see it as machines taking over tasks, making jobs disappear. But there’s another side to the story that’s just starting to get attention. It’s what I call reve... [5446 chars]

articles.title: India Mobile Congress next week to focus on 6G ecosystem development: IMC CEO
articles.description: NEW DELHI, Oct 4: The upcoming India Mobile Congress 2025 event will focus on connecting dots for 6G ecosystem development and building partnerships, a top official of digital technology platform IMC said. India Mobile Congress CEO P Ramakrishna said that the country’s recognition globally as a trusted partner makes it pivotal for driving the development of the 6G ecosystem. “India Mobile Congress is emerging as a significant platform for connecting the dots for the 6G ecosystem. On a global scale, […]
articles.content:

India Mobile Congress CEO P Ramakrishna said... [1995 chars]

articles.title: From Mughal era farmans to digital chips: DU library set for new chapter
articles.description: Alongside new wings and modern technology, the library continues to safeguard a legacy woven into the university’s own history—18th- and 19th-century manuscripts, books in multiple languages, and the rarest of gems: three original farmans issued by Mughal emperor Aurangzeb.
articles.content: But the transformation is more than bricks and mortar. Alongside new wings and modern technology, the library continues to safeguard a legacy woven into the university’s own history—18th- and 19th-century manuscripts, books in multiple languages, and... [3844 chars]

articles.title: $2B California Solar Plant To Shut Down After A Decade For The Most Frustrating Reason
articles.description: The Ivanpah facility's decommissioning comes from its use of a now-obsolete solar technology that's both more expensive and less efficient in generating energy.
articles.content: For the last decade, drivers on Interstate 15 heading through the Mojave Desert between Los Angeles and Las Vegas have passed by the massive Ivanpah Solar Electric Generating System. Located just south of the California-Nevada state line, the Ivanpah... [3416 chars]

articles.title: Udhampur airport operationalisation finalised, Kishtwar being included in ‘UDAN’: Dr Jitendra
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent NEW DELHI, Oct 4: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science and Technology; Earth Sciences and Minister of State for PMO, Department of Atomic Energy, Department of Space, Personnel, Public Grievances and Pensions, Dr. Jitendra Singh today disclosed that Udhampur airport operationalisation has been finalised while the proposed Kishtwar airport is being included in the “UDAN” scheme. The Minister was taking a review of the aviation plans for Jammu & Kashmir , underlining their importance for improving […]
articles.content:
Excelsior Correspondent
NEW DELHI, Oct 4: Union Minister of State (Independent Charge) for Science and Technology; Earth Sciences and Minister of State for PMO, Department of Atomic Energy, Department of Space, Personnel, Public Grievances and Pensio... [3602 chars]

articles.title: Indian firm Nav Wireless claims to deploy America's first LiFi internet in New York
articles.description: NEW DELHI, Oct 4: Gujarat-based Nav Wireless Technologies claimed to have deployed America’s first-ever commercial LiFi internet system in New York City. The technology has been installed at the Silicon Harlem office in New York in collaboration with JESCO Venture Labs, Nav Wireless said in a statement. “Launching LiFi in New York is not just a milestone for Nav Wireless, it is a proud moment for India. This is a clear signal that made-in-India innovations can redefine the world’s digital […]
articles.content:
NEW DELHI, Oct 4: Gujarat-based Nav Wireless Technologies claimed to have deployed America’s first-ever commercial LiFi internet system in New York City.
The technology has been installed at the Silicon Harlem office in New York in collaboration with... [924 chars]
